bio: Unsuspecting folks who accept a ride from this Yo-kai find themselves terribly lost because he has no sense of direction.

soultimate.name: You've Lost Me
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drops foe's Attack by 50% for 30 seconds.
soultimate.description: Foes' attack is greatly decreased for a time.

skill.effect: Spd ↑ when attacked, 1.6% ↑ per hit, lasts till death.
skill.name: Hit and Run

name: No-Go Kart
